H.name: Schedule H
H.description: Drugs that require a prescription from a registered medical practitioner
storageRequirements: Must be stored separately from OTC drugs

H1.name: Schedule H1
H1.description: Drugs requiring stricter prescription controls â€” must maintain records for 3 years
dispensingRules: Record drug name, batch, qty, prescriber

X.name: Schedule X
X.description: Narcotics and psychotropic substances under NDPS Act
dispensingRules: Prescriber must write in own handwriting

pharmacyInfraChecks.description: Pharmacy must have separate area for Schedule H1 drugs
pharmacyInfraChecks.fixHint: Create a designated storage area labeled 'Schedule H1' in the pharmacy.

pharmacyInfraChecks.description: Pharmacy must have a locked cabinet/safe for Schedule X drugs
pharmacyInfraChecks.fixHint: Install a double-lock cabinet for narcotics storage.

pharmacyInfraChecks.description: Schedule H1 dispensing register must be maintained
pharmacyInfraChecks.fixHint: Configure the H1 dispensing register in pharmacy settings.

pharmacyInfraChecks.description: NDPS register must be maintained for Schedule X drugs
pharmacyInfraChecks.fixHint: Configure the NDPS register in pharmacy settings.

pharmacyInfraChecks.description: Pharmacist on staff must hold valid D.Pharm/B.Pharm registration
pharmacyInfraChecks.fixHint: Ensure at least one pharmacist has verified D.Pharm or B.Pharm credential.

pharmacyInfraChecks.description: Drug license (Form 20/21) must be valid and uploaded
pharmacyInfraChecks.fixHint: Upload current Drug License (Form 20 for retail, Form 21 for wholesale).
